Ingredients: Chicken, Rice, Yogurt, Onion, Garlic, Ginger, Biryani Masala, Oil, Salt
Steps: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. 2. Fry onions until golden. 3. Cook chicken. 4. Boil rice separately. 5. Layer rice and chicken. 6. Steam (dum) for 10-15 mins.

Ingredients: Minced Meat, Potatoes, Onion, Tomato, Ginger, Garlic, Spices, Oil, Salt
Steps: 1. Fry onions. 2. Add minced meat and cook until brown. 3. Add tomatoes and spices. 4. Add potatoes and cook until tender.

Ingredients: Flour, Semolina, Sugar, Oil, Water, Chickpeas, Spices
Steps: 1. Knead dough for puri. 2. Prepare suji halwa with semolina and sugar. 3. Make chickpea curry. 4. Fry puris until golden.

Ingredients: Chicken, Tomato, Garlic, Ginger, Green Chilies, Spices, Oil
Steps: 1. Fry garlic and ginger in oil. 2. Add chicken and cook until white. 3. Add chopped tomatoes and spices. 4. Cook on high flame until oil separates.

Ingredients: Beef Shank, Flour, Onion, Nihari Masala, Ginger, Garlic, Oil
Steps: 1. Fry onions. 2. Add beef and cook with masala. 3. Add flour to thicken. 4. Cook on low flame for several hours. 5. Garnish with ginger and lemon.

Ingredients: Chickpeas, Onion, Tomato, Green Chili, Lemon Juice, Chaat Masala, Salt
Steps: 1. Boil chickpeas. 2. Chop vegetables. 3. Mix all with spices and lemon juice.

Ingredients: Minced Meat, Onion, Garlic, Ginger, Green Chili, Spices, Oil
Steps: 1. Mix all ingredients. 2. Shape into kababs on skewers. 3. Grill or fry until cooked.

Ingredients: Spinach, Mustard Greens, Cornmeal, Green Chili, Garlic, Ginger, Salt
Steps: 1. Boil greens. 2. Blend into puree. 3. Cook with spices and cornmeal.

Ingredients: Minced Meat, Chana Dal, Onion, Garlic, Ginger, Spices, Egg
Steps: 1. Boil meat and dal. 2. Blend with spices. 3. Shape patties and shallow fry.

Ingredients: Wheat, Meat, Lentils, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Spices, Oil
Steps: 1. Cook grains and lentils. 2. Cook meat separately. 3. Blend and mix all. 4. Cook until thick.

Ingredients: Flour, Potatoes, Peas, Spices, Oil, Water
Steps: 1. Prepare dough. 2. Make filling. 3. Shape and fill samosas. 4. Deep fry.

Ingredients: Minced Meat, Onion, Spices, Tomato, Yogurt, Garlic, Ginger
Steps: 1. Make meatballs. 2. Fry onion and tomato masala. 3. Add koftas and cook.

Ingredients: Boneless Chicken, Yogurt, Spices, Lemon Juice, Oil
Steps: 1. Marinate chicken in spices. 2. Grill or bake until done.

Ingredients: Okra, Onion, Tomato, Spices, Oil, Garlic
Steps: 1. Fry okra. 2. Make onion-tomato masala. 3. Add okra and cook.

Ingredients: Carrots, Milk, Sugar, Ghee, Cardamom, Nuts
Steps: 1. Grate carrots. 2. Cook in milk. 3. Add sugar and ghee. 4. Garnish with nuts.

Ingredients: Lentils, Rice, Onion, Tomato, Garlic, Spices, Oil
Steps: 1. Cook lentils with spices. 2. Prepare rice. 3. Serve together.

Ingredients: Bitter Gourd, Meat, Onion, Tomato, Spices, Oil
Steps: 1. Peel and fry karela. 2. Cook meat. 3. Mix karela and cook till done.

Ingredients: Eggs, Tomato, Onion, Garlic, Spices, Oil
Steps: 1. Fry onions. 2. Add tomatoes and spices. 3. Add boiled eggs and simmer.

Ingredients: Rice, Sugar, Food Color, Dry Fruits, Cardamom, Ghee
Steps: 1. Boil rice. 2. Mix with sugar and color. 3. Add dry fruits and ghee.

Ingredients: Milk, Rice, Sugar, Cardamom, Nuts
Steps: 1. Boil milk and add rice. 2. Cook till thick. 3. Add sugar and cardamom. 4. Garnish with nuts.

Ingredients: Spinach, Paneer, Tomato, Onion, Spices, Garlic
Steps: 1. Cook spinach. 2. Blend into puree. 3. Cook paneer with masala. 4. Mix with spinach.

Ingredients: Minced Meat, Tomato, Onion, Spices, Egg, Cornmeal
Steps: 1. Mix all ingredients. 2. Flatten into patties. 3. Shallow fry.

Ingredients: Mutton, Rice, Whole Spices, Onion, Garlic, Ginger, Yogurt
Steps: 1. Cook mutton with spices. 2. Add rice and cook until done.

Ingredients: Gram Flour, Onion, Potato, Green Chili, Spices, Water, Oil
Steps: 1. Mix all ingredients. 2. Drop batter into hot oil. 3. Fry until golden brown.

Ingredients: Yogurt, Cucumber, Mint, Salt, Roasted Cumin
Steps: 1. Grate cucumber. 2. Mix all ingredients with yogurt.
